section.title: __gnu_parallel::_Settings Struct Reference

listitem.para: Minimal input size for count and count_if.
Block size increase factor for find.
Start with looking for this many elements sequentially, for find.
Minimal input size for replace and replace_if.
Minimal input size for parallel sorting.
Such many samples to take to find a good pivot (quicksort).
Minimal input size for parallel std::transform.
size of the L1 cache in bytes (underestimation).
size of the L2 cache in bytes (underestimation).
size of the Translation Lookaside Buffer (underestimation).
The number of stolen ranges in load-balanced quicksort.
Minimal input size for search and search_n.
Block size scale-down factor with respect to current position.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: class _Settings Run-time settings for the parallel mode including all tunable parameters.
